Tests.title: React - is ... ?
Tests.rule: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

Tests.title: Component - is ...
Tests.rule: A Component is one of the core building blocks of React.
variants: Part of an application or page.

Tests.title: What is JSX?
Tests.rule: JSX is a JavaScript Extension Syntax used in React to easily write HTML and JavaScript together.
variants: This is HTML, but with the ability to complete JS.
